papers.title: Ab Initio Study of the Beryllium Isotopes $^{7}\mathrm{Be}$ to $^{12}\mathrm{Be}$
papers.authors: Shihang Shen, Serdar Elhatisari, Dean Lee, Ulf-G. Meißner, and Zhengxue Ren
papers.summary: Author(s): Shihang Shen, Serdar Elhatisari, Dean Lee, Ulf-G. Meißner, and Zhengxue RenWe present a systematic ab initio study of the low-lying states in beryllium isotopes from $^{7}\mathrm{Be}$ to $^{12}\mathrm{Be}$ using nuclear lattice effective field theory with the ${\mathrm{N}}^{3}\mathrm{LO}$ interaction. Our calculations achieve good agreement with experimental data for energ…[Phys. Rev. Lett. 134, 162503] Published Fri Apr 25, 2025

papers.title: Probing Exotic Cross-Shell Interactions at $N=28$ with Single-Neutron Transfer on $^{47}\mathrm{K}$
papers.summary: Author(s): C. J. Paxman et al.We present the first measurement of the $^{47}\mathrm{K}(d,pγ)^{48}\mathrm{K}$ transfer reaction, performed in inverse kinematics using a reaccelerated beam of $^{47}\mathrm{K}$. The level scheme of $^{48}\mathrm{K}$ has been greatly extended, with nine new bound excited states identified and spectr…[Phys. Rev. Lett. 134, 162504] Published Fri Apr 25, 2025
